channel.title: Prospero - Half Life Source music suite re-arrangement
channel.description:
You may never have quite heard this music suite this way... I have done a number of subtle rearrangements to better acent some of the score aswell as splicing the music together as it is seperated in to chunks by default in the original format,
Credit Kelly Bailey original composer of this beautiful score.
Artwork by - Michael Tannock
[url]https://vimeo.com/71216038[/url]
Hope you enjoy this arrangement :slight_smile:
I was not sure wether to post it here but it is a curiosity none the less,,, And relevant in terms of unused score and bordering on classical too.
I would really like to hear the 3rd track as menu background music... It really sums up a sci-fi movie feel akin to The Abyss, and almost Alien too with a bit of Predator for good measure. Anyway just thoughts
